# GitHub Actions Workflows

This directory contains CI/CD pipelines for the portfolio project.

## Workflows

- **ci.yml** - Build and test on every push
- **deploy.yml** - Deploy to production on main branch
- **code-quality.yml** - Quality checks on pull requests
- **dependency-update.yml** - Weekly dependency updates

## Setup

See [QUICK_START.md](../QUICK_START.md) for 5-minute setup guide.
See [SETUP_GUIDE.md](../SETUP_GUIDE.md) for detailed documentation.

## Status

All workflows require GitHub Secrets to be configured. See setup guides above.
